      • trueWind

        public void trueWind(double angle,
            double w_s,
            double b_s)
        Calculate the atmospheric Wind Direction out of the relative Wind Direction and the speed of the boat
        Parameters:
        angle - angle between boat-heading and apparent wind in degree
        w_s - apparent wind-Speed in m/s
        b_s - boat-speed in m/s
